类的使用
org.springframework.aop.framework.AopConfigException

  • 使用AopConfigException的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.aop.aspectj.annotation
    Classes enabling AspectJ 5 @Annotated classes to be used in Spring AOP.
    org.springframework.aop.framework
    Package containing Spring's basic AOP infrastructure, compliant with the AOP Alliance interfaces.

    • org.springframework.aop.aspectj.annotation中AopConfigException的使用

      org.springframework.aop.aspectj.annotation中AopConfigException的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  NotAnAtAspectException
      Extension of AopConfigException thrown when trying to perform an advisor generation operation on a class that is not an AspectJ annotation-style aspect.
      抛出AopConfigException的org.springframework.aop.aspectj.annotation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void AbstractAspectJAdvisorFactory.validate(java.lang.Class<?> aspectClass) 
      void AspectJAdvisorFactory.validate(java.lang.Class<?> aspectClass)
      Is the given class a valid AspectJ aspect class?

    • org.springframework.aop.framework中AopConfigException的使用

      抛出AopConfigException的org.springframework.aop.framework中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Advised.addAdvice(Advice advice)
      Add the given AOP Alliance advice to the tail of the advice (interceptor) chain.

      void Advised.addAdvice(int pos, Advice advice)
      Add the given AOP Alliance Advice at the specified position in the advice chain.
      void AdvisedSupport.addAdvice(int pos, Advice advice)
      Cannot add introductions this way unless the advice implements IntroductionInfo.
      void Advised.addAdvisor(Advisor advisor)
      Add an advisor at the end of the advisor chain.
      void Advised.addAdvisor(int pos, Advisor advisor)
      Add an Advisor at the specified position in the chain.
